name: Blinded
description:
Move around the map and try to find your freind as many times as possible before the time runs out! To help, you got a lantern to light up the area around you and can cast a light shock with left click, But watch out for spikes because they will take away your lightshock ability temporarily!

Controlls :

A & D : Horizontal Movement

Space : Jump

Left Click : Light Shock
